Html:
Hi Mark,
I developed a project using Naudio.But client send this issue:"Audio still splutters particularly when multi tasking on the computer i.e doing something else on the computer (Skype or email)".
How to solve this particular issue?
N.B:Client test on 64 bit windows 8 machine and ram=4Gb,I-3 processor.
well how complicated is the audio playback graph? Are you doing any DSP/visualisation?
